subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Jürgen Klopp's chemistry with the Dortmund club had grown stale, and he remains young enough, charismatic enough, and available enough to take on one of the rich and powerful European clubs.
snippet: Jürgen Klopp's chemistry with the Dortmund club had grown stale, and he remains young enough, charismatic enough, and available enough to take on one of the rich and powerful European clubs.
